limit.name: begrænsning
limit.description: Det maksimale antal resultater der skal returneres (maks. & standard: 50).

starts-with.name: starter-med
starts-with.description: Returnér kun ord, der starter med denne værdi (gensidigt eksklusiv med endelsen).

ends-with.name: ender-med
ends-with.description: Returnér kun ord, der slutter med denne værdi (gensidigt eksklusiv med start-with).

errors.with_clause_exclusivity: Valgmulighederne `starter-med` og `ender-med` er gensidigt eksklusive -- du kan ikke bruge dem begge på samme tid.
errors.not_found: Beklager, jeg kunne ikke finde nogen resultater til din forespørgsel!
errors.not_found_w_suggestions: I'm sorry, I couldn't find any results for your query! Perhaps you meant:
errors.no_permissions: You don't have permission to use this command.
errors.banned:
I'm afraid you've been banned from using Thoth.
Reason: {{- reason}}

meta.name: tillægsord
meta.description: Svar med adjektiver, der beskriver din forespørgsel.

word.name: ord
word.description: Det navneord at søge relevante adjektiver for (fx: ocean).

adjective.success:
Jeg fandt `{{found_count}}` adjektiver til at beskrive `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: definition
meta.description: Svar med definitionen af din forespørgsel fra Merriam Webster.

word.name: ord
word.description: Ordet der skal søges efter (fx: ocean).

short.name: short
short.description: Only return the first definition (default: false).

meta.name: homophones
meta.description: Responds with homophones (sound-alike words) for your query.

word.name: ord
word.description: The word to search homophones for (eg: their).

meta.name: holonyms
meta.description: Responds with holonyms (what comprises) for your query.

word.name: ord
word.description: The word to search homophones for (eg: car).

meta.name: hyponyms
meta.description: Responds with hyponyms (more general) for your query.

word.name: ord
word.description: The word to search hyponyms for (eg: car).

meta.name: close-rhyme
meta.description: Responds with words that closely rhyme with your query.

word.name: ord
word.description: The word to search close rhymes for (eg: forest).

close-rhyme.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that closely rhyme with `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: triggers
meta.description: Responds with words that are statistically associated with your query.

word.name: ord
word.description: The word to search triggers for (eg: cow).

triggers.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that closely rhyme with `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: invitér
meta.description: Returnerer et invitationslink til at tilføje Thoth til din server.

invite.success: Vil du tilføje Thoth til din server? [Klik her]({{link}})!

meta.name: match-ord
meta.description: Svarer med ord, der matcher det ord du angiver (fx: a??le -> apple, d???? -> date).

match-word.success:

{{words}}

meta.name: navneord
meta.description: Svarer med navneord, der ofte beskrives af din forespørgsel.

word.name: ord
word.description: Tillægsordet for at søge relevante navneord for (fx: yellow).

noun.success:
Jeg fandt `{{found_count}}` ord til at beskrive `{{word}}`:

meta.name: ping
meta.description: Sikrer, at botten reagerer på kommandoer.

pongs: Hvad er der med jer mennesker og den konstante lyst til at genere mig?
Ud af alle her, valgte du at genere mig?
Kan vi bare få det over med?? Jeg har ting at gøre.
Gør det igen. Jeg vover dig.

meta.name: rime
meta.description: Svarer med ord, der rimer med din forespørgsel.

word.name: ord
word.description: The word to search rhymes for (eg: dime).

rhyme.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that rhyme with `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: wotd
meta.description: Configure the Word of the Day channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to set as the Word of the Day channel.

errors.guild_text_only: The Word of The Day channel must be a text channel!
errors.no_perms: I don't have permissions to create a webhook in {{- channel}}.

wotd.success: The Word of The Day will be posted in {{- channel}} every day at <t:1667538001:t> (12am GMT-5).
wotd.no_channel: You must provide a channel to set as the Word of the Day channel.

meta.name: similar-meaning
meta.description: Response with words that have a similar meaning to your query.

word.name: ord
word.description: The word to search similar words for (eg: transgressions).

I found `{{found_count}}` words that are similar to `{{word}}`{{rest}}:

similar-meaning.ends_with_success:
